data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dadelahi, Samin D., Shaw, Scott R., Aguirre, Helmuth, Almeida, Luis Felipe V. de (2018): A taxonomic study of Costa Rican Leptodrepana with the description of twenty-four new species (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Cheloninae). ZooKeys 750: 59-130, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.750.23536, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.750.23536
